name: Dungeon Hearts DX
description: Dungeon Hearts fuses the strategy and pattern matching of puzzle games with the kinetic pace of action games. Align magical runes as they flow along the Fatestream to attack, defend, and conjure magic in frenetic battles against a bestiary of fantastic creatures out to use those same runes against you. Control eight heroes and form parties of 4 in order to defeat the Dark One! Along the way players will unlock new Abilities, Tavern Music and full Soundtracks!
